explains: adj. 受过教育的；有教养的
v. （在学校）教育；教导，训练；使（孩子）受学校教育（educate 的过去式和过去分词）
wordGroup: educated guess n. 有根据的推测

sentences.en: She was educated in the US.
He was educated at Yale and Stanford.
sentences.cn: 他是在耶鲁和斯坦福接受的教育。

sentences.en: Many of the immigrants are well-educated.
sentences.cn: 许多移民受过良好的教育。
